alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Greene; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 9:56PM EDT until March 31 at 1:23PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Rivervale...down to Shoals. White River at Newberry...down to Hazleton. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Elliston. .Widespread lowland flooding continues along the East Fork White River from Rivervale to Shoals....and along the White River at Elliston to Hazleton. Moderate flooding is occurring on the White River at Petersburg...and is forecast to start at Hazleton midday Friday. Moderate flooding is expected to end on the White River on Sunday. The crest on the East Fork White River will pass from Williams to Shoals tonight...while the crest on the White River will slowly pass Petersburg late Friday. Minor flooding is expected to end on the East Fork White River early next week...and on the White River at Greene County points tonight...while continuing at Edwardsport and points downriver through at least next week. Rain going into this weekend may extend flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated by noon Friday. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...White River at Newberry. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, High water may affect CR 550 S in the Mary Long Cutoff area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 13.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM EDT Thursday was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 4.7 feet Sunday, April 09. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
